attributes.action: bring back all the troups overseas all countrys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is a petition with a longer deadline to reach more people not just in the uk but in every country that has sons daughters fathers mothers sisters brothers and cousins fighting in a none essential war

this is not just for uk troops this is for all the troops

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
